note.p: Florist, nurseryman, and seedsman. Of Westerham, Kent. Son of John Cattell (1786/7–1860) and Sarah Cattell (1791/2–63) of Westerham.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO 107/1613/467/3), 1861 (RG9/489/75/13)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 12 June 2015)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 12 June 2015)
Post Office directory of the six home counties 1859–66
